name: No More Spacers - Give Me Health!
name_original: No More Spacers - Give Me Health!
description:
This is the same as the LD version, except the player has 5x health and gets a little more back when defeating enemies!

This should make it more convenient to explore the combat.

Thanks for playing!

Original build for Ludum Dare 42 here: https://jh318.itch.io/no-more-spacers
